location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 69: Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter Samuel Manesty thanks Edward Galley for making an application to the Sheik of Congoon [KangƒÅn] for the release of the express boats that were taken by him. Manesty states that he and the Mussaleem of Bussora [Basra] have written to the Sheik of Congoon to request the immediate release of the boats.
